intro: Koordersiodendron celebicum, commonly known as the Celebes magnolia, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Magnoliales and is characterized by its large, showy, fragrant flowers that are typically pink or white. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are usually elliptical in shape and have a smooth surface. It thrives in tropical climates and is often found in moist, well-drained soils in forested areas. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and for its potential medicinal properties.
